scripts.register: npx -y xcratch-register --id=screenshot --gui=../scratch-gui --block=./src/vm/extensions/block --entry=./src/gui/lib/libraries/extensions/entry --core --link --use=extension-support util import sprites engine
scripts.setup-prerequisites: test -d ../scratch-gui || git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/xcratch/scratch-gui.git ../scratch-gui; test -d ../scratch-vm || git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/xcratch/scratch-vm.git ../scratch-vm; test -d ../scratch-gui/node_modules/scratch-vm || ( (cd ../scratch-vm && npm install && npm link); (cd ../scratch-gui && npm install && npm link scratch-vm); )
